name: Monster Castle (itch) (piranhaMagi)
description:
How to Play

Control monsters to defend Dracula's coffin from Heroes! Left click or draw a box around monsters to select them and right click to move them. RTS controls.

Collect  from killing Heroes & spend them on monster upgrades.

Tip: You can double click monsters or their portraits to select multiple monsters at once!

Credits

Developers: piranhaMagi & Vyrdian

We used art freely available on the web that we did not create. Attributions:
